window_controls.announcement: Read the latest message in a bottle

update.available: A new update off the port bow! Click to plunder.
update.downloaded: Update ready to install when ye leave port.

drop_cover.text: Drop yer mod here to stow it aboard

onboarding.title: Ahoy!
onboarding.description_download: Let’s hunt for a copy of DDLC, matey.
onboarding.button_download: Set sail for the official download port
onboarding.s1_desc: Ye need to plunder a copy of Doki Doki Literature Club from the official port (ddlc.moe) – click below to set sail.
onboarding.s1_platform: When asked, grab the file marked "DDLC ({0})".
onboarding.s2_desc: Once ye have yer loot, select it below.
onboarding.description_location: Yer games will be stashed at {0}

login_input.message: Enter yer message in a bottle (email)
login_input.details: A parrot will deliver a link to this address.

change_username_input.details: Monikers need not be unique among pirates.

uninstall_confirmation.message: Ye sure ye want to uninstall?
uninstall_confirmation.details: Yer save data for {0} will be sent to Davy Jones' locker, and ye'll need a copy of the mod to install again.

rename_input.details: Enter the new name for {0}, matey.

mod_delete_confirmation.message: Ye sure ye want to delete the mod?
mod_delete_confirmation.details: Ye'll need to plunder another copy of the mod to install again.

save_delete_confirmation.message: Ye sure ye want to delete yer save data?
save_delete_confirmation.details: Ye'll have to start {0} again from scratch.

install.description_screenshots: Press S while playin' to take a screenshot.
install.description_sdk: This mod supports special features with the Doki Doki Mod Manager SDK!

install_creation.title: Install DDLC
install_creation.description_mod: Click to browse fer a mod.
install_creation.description_vanilla: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_vanilla_global_save: A clean copy of DDLC will be created. The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.description_modded: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. The save data will be separate from any other copy of the game.
install_creation.description_modded_global_save: A copy of DDLC will be created, and the mod will be installed. The save data will be shared with other copies of the game (e.g. Steam)
install_creation.status_exists: That folder already exists. Pick another folder name.

tab_store_placeholder.title: The market be comin' soon!
tab_store_placeholder.description_1: The Sayonika mod database will be a central port to share, download and review DDLC mods. When Sayonika is open to all, ye'll be able to browse mods right here in Doki Doki Mod Manager.
tab_store_placeholder.description_2: While ye wait, download some of these recommended mods.
tab_store_placeholder.error: Failed to load the list of mods. Are ye offline?

tab_store.title: Sayonika Market
tab_store.subtitle: Discover and download DDLC mods
tab_store.offline_message: Ye be offline. Check yer internet and try again.
tab_store.maintenance_banner: Authentication services be down for maintenance. Ye can still browse mods but can't log in or register.
tab_store.no_mods_message: Try adjusting yer search or filters

login.title: Login to Sayonika
login.username_help: Ye can use either yer username or email address to log in

translation.enabled: Translation enabled. Content will be translated when available.

section_backgrounds.title: Background
section_backgrounds.subtitle: Customize yer Doki Doki Mod Manager with backgrounds.
section_backgrounds.description_credit: Original DDLC backgrounds by Team Salvato.

section_storage.title: Storage Location
section_storage.subtitle: Change where yer game data be stashed.
section_storage.description_moving: Warning! If ye change yer install location, all yer mods, installs and save data will be moved. This may take a while, and can't be stopped.

section_updates.title: Updates
section_updates.subtitle: Get the latest version of Doki Doki Mod Manager.

section_testing.title: SDK Debug
section_testing.subtitle: Enable debug logging to test yer mods.

section_language.title: Language
section_language.subtitle: Change the language of Doki Doki Mod Manager.
section_language.notification_changed: Language changed to {0}. Restart to see changes.

tab_about.title: About Yar
tab_about.description: Doki Doki Mod Manager be a community project to help ye find, install and play mods for Doki Doki Literature Club, a free Visual Novel game by Team Salvato.
tab_about.disclaimer_1: Doki Doki Mod Manager be a fan work and not by Team Salvato. It be a fan work, as Team Salvato's IP rules say.
tab_about.disclaimer_2: Doki Doki Mod Manager not responsible for any damage to yer files or ship. Make sure mods be safe to play.
tab_about.social_email: Send me a message in a bottle

jumplist.task_launch: Open Doki Doki Mod Manager and launch {0}, matey!

running_cover.description_running: Close the game to change yer mods.
running_cover.install_missing: The install could not be found.
running_cover.install_corrupt: The install is incomplete or broken.
running_cover.install_crashed: The game failed to launch or crashed.

mod_browse_dialog.title: Find a mod to install, matey!

game_browse_dialog.title: Locate a copy of DDLC's zip file, matey!

shortcut_dialog.title: Choose where to put yer shortcut, matey!

exception.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager crashed, matey!
exception.body: Problem reported. Restart and try again, matey!

move_install.title: Failed to move install folder, matey!

shortcut.title: Failed to create shortcut, matey!
shortcut.body: Check permission for this folder, matey!

rename.title: Failed to rename, matey!
rename.body: Close other programs and try again, matey!

uninstall.title: Failed to uninstall, matey!
uninstall.body: Close other programs and try again, matey!

save_delete.title: Failed to delete save data, matey!
save_delete.body: Close other programs and try again, matey!

mod_delete.title: Failed to delete the mod, matey!
mod_delete.body: Close other programs and try again, matey!

renderer_freeze.title: Doki Doki Mod Manager stopped responding, matey!
renderer_freeze.body: If this lasts a long time, close the app and start again, matey!

executable_permission.title: Failed to make game executable, matey!
executable_permission.body: Could not make DDLC.sh executable on Linux. The game may not launch, matey!
